abstract.t: If QUIC is to be used in a peer-to-peer manner, with NAT traversal, then it is necessary to be able to demultiplex QUIC and STUN flows running on a single UDP port. This memo discusses options for how to perform such demultiplexing. It also considers demultiplexing of QUIC and WebRTC traffic (both media and data) when running on a single UDP port.
